title: White Cane Flag Day begins
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by Nalin Hewapathirana – The first flag of the flag campaign launched by the Sri Lanka Council of Visually Impaired Graduates’ Association in line with International White Cane Day was pinned on President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Tempe Trees this afternoon on 08 October.
